document_name: Presidential Decree No.101 of 2005 on the establishment of the Public Environmental Protection Authority
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/YEM/2005/YEM-2005-12-25-Presidential Decree No.101 of 2005 on the establishment of the Public Environmental Protection Authority_9dd8ed429b08546589d45094675b9319.pdf
document_description: One of the responsibilities of the Authority is to reduce air pollution and mitigate the effects of climate change.
